levels.name: Try Link Mechanics 1
levels.topText: Tab the P and drag all the way to O to link the word POTATO

levels.name: Try Link Mechanics 2
levels.topText: You can link tiles vertically, horizontally or diagonally.

levels.name: Try Link Mechanics 3
levels.topText: Let me give you some help just in case you are a real potato...

levels.name: Try Merge 1
levels.topText: Look, we dont need two A here. Lets link them together to merge it into one large A.

levels.name: Try Merge 2
levels.topText: Whoa, it is way too many O here...

levels.name: Try Merge 3
levels.topText: Remember, you can only merge tiles if they have the same lettes and are able to form a rectangular shape.

levels.name: Chainify 1
levels.topText: Hey potato, the icon at the bottom is Chainify. It turns one of the tiles into a Chain tile, which helps you bridge two tiles that are one block away from each other. Just tap the blue icon, then tap the Z to link POTATO.

levels.name: Chainify 2
levels.topText: Want to prove you are a smart potato? Turn a merged tile into a Chain tile.

levels.name: Exchange 1
levels.topText: Oops, the order is messed up. Can you help me swap the A and T by using the Exchange ability? Just simply tap the two tiles you want to swap after activating it.
